description:
Inuyasha and the gang meet Izumo, who is investigating the secret of the creation of the Sacred Jewel. They hear that a demon has appeared, and go to investigate a nearby village.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El creador de la perla de Shikon (1ª parte)
Os criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas (Parte 1)
Shikon no Tama o Tsukuru Mono (Zenpen)
The Sacred Jewel Maker Part I
四魂の玉を造る者 (前編)
